resources.string: Watch the video and then click on the ads to get extra reward. we give you 30 points instantly with out any verification we trust you. If you are cheating you will not be paid.

string.name: faqtext1
string.i: -Watch video ad, explore the new apps and complete the survey. Follow the instruction which is given in the respective task.

string.name: faqtext7
string.i: -Yes, it is very easy to make money. Basically, we are sharing our profits with our user. So that both can earn by at home and free time.

string.name: faqtext3
string.i: -Yes, you can. But for that, you need another mobile number and phone. Using the same mobile for the different account will lose the coins.

string.name: faqtext4
string.i: -For Redeem your money, you need at least 10000 points. You can earn points by watching videos and referring others.

string.name: faqtext5
string.i: -Your earning is depend on your task and you will get paid 100 INR/10000 points

string.name: faqtext6
string.i: -If you do not follow instructions OR violate any rules then you probably lose your account

string.name: faqtext2
string.i: -We send money through Paytm, directly to the Bank account(NEFT Transfer), Bitcoin (minimum limit 20000 points), PayPal(2% will be charged).

string.name: faqtext8
string.i: -Within 6 working days, your reward will be transferred to valid account details.

string.name: faqtext9
string.i: -If it was paypal or bitcoin we directly gets sended to your account, But, when it is paytm or google pay first we convert into your currency and gets transfered.

DISCLAIMER- That we do not charge even a single rupee from any of our users of our applications as such do not have any commercial contractual understanding with any of its user and the use of our applications by the user is the exclusive choice of the users considering his/her own interest and a benefit, it is, therefore, during the validity of use of our application and any time thereafter, we shall not be under legal mandate to pay any money to any of the user of our apps and the user of our applications, at all times, shall be free to opt-out/uninstall our applications.

ARBITRATION NOTICE: BY ACCESSING OR USING THE SERVICES YOU AGREE THAT DISPUTES BETWEEN YOU AND The US, YOU WAIVE YOUR RIGHT TO PARTI CREATE IN A CLASS ACTION LAWSUIT, INITIATION OF ANY CIVIL AND/OR CRIMINAL PROCEEDINGS AGAINST us (Free Rokda Team) AND ANY SUCH ACTION IF INITIATED BY THE YOU I.E. If you do not agree to be bound by all of these Terms of Use, do not access or use the Service. Survey Serving Technology

We allow third-party companies to serveads and collect certain anonymous information when you visit our app. These companies may use anonymous information such as your Google Advertising ID, your device type, and version, browsing activity, location and other technical data relating to your device, in order to provide advertisements. This app uses Pollfish SDK. Pollfish is an online survey platform, through which, anyone may conduct surveys. Pollfish collaborates with Developers of applications for smartphones in order to have access to users of such applications and address survey questionnaires to them. When a user connects to this app, a specific set of users device data (including Advertising. The ID which will be processed by Pollfish only in strict compliance with google play policies- and/or other devices data) and response meta-data (including information about the apps which the user has installed on his mobile phone)is automatically sent to Pollfish servers, in order for Pollfish to discern whether the user is eligible for a survey. For a full list of data received by Pollfish through this app, please read carefully Pollfish respondent terms located at https://www.pollfish.com/terms/respondent. These data will be associated with your answers to the questionnaires whenever Polllfish sents such questionnaires to eligible users. By downloading the application you accept this privacy policy document and you hereby give you consent for the processing by Pollfish of the aforementioned data. Furthermore, you are informed that you may disable Pollfish operation at any time by using the Pollfish "opt-out section" available on Pollfish website. We once more invite you to check the respondents terms of use, if you wish to have more detailed view of the way Pollfish works.
